name: Astro (itch) (Saspatoon)
description:
A - Move Left

D - Move Right

A Dobule tap - Heal

D Double tap - Shrink

(Sorry if you experience inconsistent double taps, i couldnt figure out why before it ended)

I spent about 2 days making this while i watched Csgo Blast pro series and youtube on another monitor.  I wish i started sooner and focused on it more but anyway it has 1 level, i didnt even have time to test if the end works. If you make it to the end be proud i struggled and its my game lmao. Have fun!
